About Me

# Hello. My Name Is Jon Kuperman. ### I Love WordPress, Web Design, Blogging, Search Engine Optimization and All Things Technology. I started developing websites in 2010 and haven't looked back. I read blogs all day and write blogs all night. I love building websites, especially in WordPress and I get a lot of joy out of teaching what I know to others. I'm really interested in Responsive Web Design, People Who Start Their Own Businesses, and Prolific Bloggers. My ambitions are to: + Become An Expert Blogger + One Day Work On The WordPress Core Development Team + Build A Lot Of Super Cool Web Applications + Contribute To Open Source Projects Like jQuery and WordPress Interested in collaborating on a project together or just want to talk? Email me @ jon [at] insitedesignlab.com and we'll talk!
